description: Mexican restaurant located in the Eastern District, yet it offers spacious seating unlike other crowded small restaurants nearby. The staff is friendly and eager to introduce the dishes, and they enjoy chatting with customers. The tacos and sauce boast authentic Mexican flavors.
address: No. 9, Lane 21, Section 1, Anhe Rd, Da'an District, Taipei City, Taiwan 106

product1.description:
4 Tacos set + 1 drink.
Prices only valid for lunch set offer Monday - Friday 11:30 - 1430
product1.name: Lunch Special Set A
